root.name: Sonic Spike World Championship Beach Volleyball
root.description: OverviewSonic Spike World Championship Beach Volleyball is a 1990 volleyball game published by IGS for the TurboGrafx-16.PortThe game was ported to the Game Boy and was released by IGS in Japan as "World Beach Volley: 1991 GB Cup", and by Taito in Europe as "World Beach Volley: 1992 GB Cup". Taito was going to release it in North America as "Beach Volley" however it was canceled.
